definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: These are the keys to keeping up in the fast-paced arena of social networks.
sentences.chinese: 這是在日新月異的社交網絡環境中生存的要義。

sentences.english: "Filial and piety" and "love others" are its first essence.
sentences.chinese: 孝悌“和”愛衆“是它的第一要義。

sentences.english: Lu Xun's wisdom is more reflected from his belief that "Living is the first".
sentences.chinese: 魯迅的智慧更多的體現在以“生存”爲第一要義上。

sentences.english: The book is in compliance with Liang Shuming's Main Points of Chinese Culture.
sentences.chinese: 此書與梁漱溟《中國文化要義》聲氣相求，互爲奧援。

sentences.english: The essential factor of service-type government is to provide a satisfying public service to common people.
sentences.chinese: 爲公衆提供滿意的公共服務是服務型政府的基本要義。

sentences.english: The most important business of every business is to stay in business.
sentences.chinese: 商業的第一要義是在商言商。

sentences.english: There’s simply no good way to replicate its concise punch in English.
sentences.chinese: 英語里根本沒有好辦法複製它的精華要義。

definition: to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
proposition (logic, math.)/to assign an essay topic
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
scholarship/high-level study/to do scholarly research/to pursue a high level of study
see 承前啟後|承前启后[cheng2 qian2 qi3 hou4]
